content:
Kael had been sitting at the bar, nursing a glass of cheap whiskey. He was not in the best of moods, as he had been waiting for his target all day. The bar's dim lighting and loud music did little to improve his mood. He had been watching the entrance for hours, waiting for his quarry to make an appearance.
Finally, after what felt like an eternity, Kael saw the man he had been hired to bring in.
